EmailTemplate.description: S3 Employee Line - New Service Request Notification
EmailTemplate.name: S3 Employee Line - New Service Request Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: “New” MySutter Connection Service Request #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your {!Case.Customer_Intent__c} inquiry.
Service Request Number {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created for your reference. Please use this reference number when calling about your request.
You will receive another email notification when your service request has been resolved.
If you would like to check the status, please login to MySutter Connection at https://mysutterconnection.force.com, and click on Help/Service Requests. Select My Service Requests to see an entire list of your submitted inquires.
Thank you,
Sutter Health
